channel.title: Stick it in Your Ear Hole

image.title: Stick it in your ear hole

channel.itunes:author: Damian and Parker
channel.itunes:subtitle: A show about Awesome

item.title: Episode 44 - My FUBAR is SNAFU
item.description:
The boys do it again this time with some of the creators of the Graphic Novel FUBAR! (Jeff McComsey, Dominic Vivona and Steve Becker) These guys are working hard at kicking ass and taking names so shut up and listen. Please

oh and Joe Krzemiensk is also in part of it, so enjoy

item.title: Episode 43 - Atomic Robo and the Killer Klowns
item.description: The boys get legit....some would say too legit....but never too legit to quit. Nonetheless, the boys talk with some special guests (from the Fictory. They discuss Atomic Robo and Fictory Comics all while Parker and Damian try desperately to get off topic.
item.itunes:summary: Joseph W. Krzemienski, Jeff McComsey, Dominic Vivona and Steve Becker

item.title: Episode 42 - Kinda leary
item.description: The boys are back and as ok as ever! Check it Out!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
item.itunes:author: Damian and Parker

item.title: Come on now! Seriously!
item.description: OK this is just getting ridiculous. If you need constant validation that you are great listeners. Then maybe you should go look toward another podcast. Because I am out of compliments probably for the century. So whatever if you haven't give yet, you still can...until Sunday. Let's get back to work here people. Also enjoy this mish mash mix-em-up of our snafu's both modem based and vocal chord based.
item.itunes:author: Damian and Parker

item.title: TABOR Marathon highlights Part 2
item.description: Ok seriously thanks again. I mean I feel like I already said all this but thanks so much for giving. You can still give so if you want to just click anywhere. Also here is another bunch of nonsense you may have missed. Thanks so much again!
item.itunes:author: Damian and Parker

item.title: TABOR Marathon highlights Part 1
item.description:
So far the tally is over $1000. That means Damian and I have to bite into onions just like Mel Gibson. I am sure we will be doing that sometime this week. Also you can still give all week long. As an incentive we will be releasing some excerpt from the marathon for those who weren't able to check it out. But again thank you so much I think this was a MAJOR SUCCESS! But we couldn't have done it without all of you so again THANK YOU!!!

Tabor
Donate
item.itunes:author: Damian and Parker

item.title: This just in Damian thinks you're great!!!!!!!
item.description:
Ok everybody we are doing the dumbest thaw have ever attempted, we are going to raise money for the Taber house by doing a 26 hour broadcast on upstream.
Since we aren't just doing it for our health we thought we would give some incentive to donate so here you go heres the even dumber thing we will do for your money.

Every time someone donate:

$20 We will Sing a song of donators choice.

$50 We will drink a whole bawls

$100 Parker will put on a smaller kids shirt.
$100 Damian will eat a whole wad of wasabi/horseradish

If we reach these over all levels we will then jump though these hoop.

$100 Dance the entire party song viewers choice

$250 Damian will do Carmens Lazarus.

$500 Parker will reenacts Carmans The Champion

$1000 we will both bite into an onion like Mel Gibson in lethal weapon

$5000 Parker drinks a shot of liquor (viewers choice)

$1,000,000 The boys dance the full Monty.

So there ya have it please help us get sick and embarrassed because caring is sharing

For more info about Taber check out:
http://www.tabornet.org/
http://www.wix.com/taborcs/myom
And go to https://co.clickandpledge.com/advanced/default.aspx?wid=34263 to donate

To get a hold of us goto stickitinyourearhole.com or leave us a message @(717) 842-0551
item.itunes:author: Damian and Parker

item.title: Episode 41 - You Must be Road Trippin'
item.description: The boys take it to the streets and learn life is a highway and then they came to the conclusion they want to ride said highway all night long but the they thought about the price of gas and their carbon footprint and changed their minds.
item.itunes:author: Damian and Parker

item.title: Episode 40 - Carman
item.description: The boys go on a pilgrimage to the holy land to find God and end up in East Berlin and find Carman!
item.itunes:author: Damian and Parker

item.title: Episode 39 - Whackadoo
item.description: The boys sit down with their friend Max Phillips and hear about his love of pickles and JAG.
item.itunes:author: Damian and Parker

item.title: Episode 38 - Effin' and Jeffin'
item.description: The boys reminisce with Jeff McComsey and Matt about connecting to Prodigy on their IBMs.
item.itunes:author: Damian and Parker

item.title: Episode 37 - Jeff Mccomsey, Matt Shaffer and Farts
item.description: The boys try to talk to Jeff McComsey but Matt Shaffer gets in the way. Also Parker makes us all feel better about ourselves.
item.itunes:author: Damian and Parker

item.title: Episode 36 - Rockamedia
item.description: The boys spend some more time with Allen to discuss some very special people.
item.itunes:author: Damian and Parker

item.title: ROCK PAPER PLEASE HELP!
item.description: Ok our friend Jason Pohlig is putting on a Rock Paper Scissors Tournament on May 8th @ 11am till 11pm at Square One Coffee to raise money for Haiti and Chile. This is an unedited version of the promo we did before he changed the date, we thought it was a lot to go though just to be thrown it away so enjoy.
item.itunes:author: Damian and Parker

item.title: Episode 35 - Clements OUT!
item.description: The boys final do something with their lives and make a joyous noise with their friend Allen Clements.
item.itunes:author: Damian and Parker

item.title: Episode 34 - The President's Assistant
item.description: The boys finally get down to business with Ben Koch…luckily, it immediately descends into a discussion of Santa Claus and children’s football.
item.itunes:author: Damian and Parker

item.title: Episode 33 - The Honorable Ben Koch
item.description: The boys get a rare visit from their friend from across the country Ben Koch. Unfortunately they spend the first episode talking nonsense and cracking wise about statisticians.
item.itunes:author: Damian and Parker

item.title: Episode 32 - Ho Ho Joe Merry Christmas
item.description: The boys learn something about Joe and a little about themselves this Christmas or something. Happy Holidays everyone!!!!
item.itunes:author: Damian and Parker

item.title: Episode 31 -Here we Joe again on our own!
item.description: The boys finally get a chance to talk to Joe about his actual accomplishments but it quickly descends into nonsense as usual or something
item.itunes:author: Damian and Parker

item.title: Episode 30 - I Gotta Feeling
item.description: The boys getta feeling that their newest guest Joe will be the most last guest of the year.
item.itunes:author: Damian and Parker

item.title: Episode 12 - Thanx to the MAXX!!!
item.description:
The Boys let out a maximum shout out and debate the finer points of proper facebook etiquette

-=-=--Spoiler Alert!=-=--=-

There will be more facebook correspondent in the future!

item.title: Episode 11 - A very special Episode
item.description: The Boys open their hearts and a find story from the past just might be the way out of Iraq.

item.title: Episode 10 - Nice Bum
item.description: The Boys set out to save America with Obama and Thompson's WaterSeal!

item.title: Episode 9 - Brian Franklin
item.description:
The Boys hate on Radio Shack employees because they are jealous and Jukebox regulars because they are pathetic.

Brian Franklin is the great and amazing man who covered our theme song. He is a wonderful and incredible guy and his version of our song is both enlightening and inspiring. MEET HIM!

item.title: Episode 8 - FreeCycle Summit
item.description: The Boys debate the practicality of a community based solely on the movement of garbage.

item.title: Episode 7 - Cut the Phat
item.description: The boys attempt to edutain an entertainer with a combination of grooming tips and sweet lullabies.

item.title: Episode 6 Always be prepared
item.description: The boys discuss the downfall of print media at the feet of this twiter culture.

item.title: Episode 5 - Superpowers
item.description: The boys debate mutated disabilities and create the Poddies.

item.title: Episode 2 - Supersale
item.description: The boys find themselves caught between a kabuki and a hard creamer!
item.itunes:author: Damian and Parker

item.title: Episode 1 - Stickitinyourearhole
item.description: We like to talk

item.title: Episode 13 - Shooter Doodles
item.description: The Boys tie up some loose ends and become responsible members of the podcasting community and then get board .

item.title: Episode 14 - The Country Rap
item.description: The boys discover they're racist anti-patriots.

item.title: Episode 15 - Desmond the lying saint
item.description:
The Boys speak with Matt Shaffer about one specific thing but don't get to it till next week.

Colleen Neal!

item.title: Episode 16 - Do it forum...Do it for all of um
item.description: The boys talk to that dude some more.

item.title: Episode 17 - Creatively Wireds after birth
item.description: The boys meet up with their friends Anne Kirby and Max Phillips over at Creatively Wired and and talk about old people and other countries.

item.title: Episode 18 - Site Problems
item.description: The boys go over some of their favorite hits due to site problems. Stay tuned for 18a for the full explanation.

item.title: Episode 18a - We are so sorry
item.description: The boys are ashamed

item.title: SAD-CON part 1
item.description:
Here it is finally the boys get down to brass tax.

After each episode please vote for the best scenario. You can vote by comment, email, facebook or even in person. After the fourth part we will tally the votes in each category and announce a winner. One vote per person per matchup, please. At the end of the voting process we will put all the names in a hat and pick one at random to win an amazing prize.

item.description:
The boys say more sad stuff.

After each episode please vote for the best scenario. You can vote by comment, email, facebook or even in person. After the fourth part we will tally the votes in each category and announce a winner. One vote per person per matchup, please. At the end of the voting process we will put all the names in a hat and pick one at random to win an amazing prize.
